video.title: Boss
video.synopsis: Kelsey Grammer stars in this dark drama as Chicago mayor Tom Kane, a viperous politician unafraid to step outside the law when it suits his interests.

episodes.synopsis: Mayor Tom Kane has just discovered he has a serious medical condition but must focus on the upcoming gubernatorial primary.
episodes.title: Listen

episodes.synopsis: Kane and his crew must flex their political muscles to stay on top, but some worrying news fuels his wife's suspicions.
episodes.title: Reflex

episodes.synopsis: As Zajac's campaign gains momentum, Kane must adjust to his medical reality. Meanwhile, Governor Cullen faces an embarrassing media storm.
episodes.title: Swallow

episodes.synopsis: Kane is losing control, politically and personally, as his supporters begin to question their confidence in him.
episodes.title: Slip

episodes.synopsis: When long-buried information resurfaces with the primary just around the corner, Kane and his camp must battle the media to contain it.
episodes.title: Remembered

episodes.synopsis: Kane takes a break as his political image hits an all-time low. Meanwhile, an increasingly suspect Meredith seeks opportunities of her own.
episodes.title: Spit

episodes.synopsis: Days before the election, Kane slowly regains control over City Hall. Will doing the unthinkable improve his public image in time?
episodes.title: Stasis

episodes.synopsis: On Election Day, the race is close, and Kane and Stone do their part to turn the gears of the political machine.
episodes.title: Choose

episodes.synopsis: Kane looks to the future, setting his sights on reviving a subsidized housing project, and continues to battle for control over his disease.
episodes.title: Louder Than Words

episodes.synopsis: Kane tries to repair his fractured inner circle by poaching his nemesis's senior aide and hiring an ambitious newcomer -- but can they fill the void?
episodes.title: Through and Through

episodes.synopsis: Kane grows increasingly infatuated with his new senior aide, Mona, allowing himself to get swept up in her passion for the subsidized housing project.
episodes.title: Ablution

episodes.synopsis: Kane makes a professional turn to a new way of doing things when he extricates the housing project from the corruption that plagues his entire city.
episodes.title: Redemption

episodes.synopsis: Kane spirals out of control when his mental symptoms reach a boiling point and he can no longer distinguish between his hallucinations and reality.
episodes.title: Mania

episodes.synopsis: Kane's maneuvering causes rioting and looting, and as Chicago burns, Kane secretly seeks treatment at an alternative clinic where his past haunts him.
episodes.title: Backflash

episodes.synopsis: Kane's treatment seems to have worked and he is back in control. Meredith accepts her role as First Lady but discovers Kane's obsession with his aide.
episodes.title: The Conversation

episodes.synopsis: Kane keeps the city from bankruptcy by forming alliances on the City Council, but then must make decisions that might weaken his political machine.
episodes.title: Consequence

episodes.synopsis: Chicago is bankrupt, but losing his mayoral power isn't the biggest danger to Kane as various enemies threaten to expose his illness and corruption.
episodes.title: Clinch

episodes.synopsis: As Kane's mental faculties deteriorate, the Sentinel editor is about to break a story that will destroy him, and other dangers threaten as well.
episodes.title: True Enough
